pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, April 24, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

Closed to media.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation, and a media availability will follow.

Rideau Cottage
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 10:45 a.m. and to make their way to the P1 Gate once on the grounds.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7527
    Toll-free: 1-888-265-0903
    Pass code: 3418355#

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks via video to pay his respects and mourn the loss of the victims of the mass shooting in Nova Scotia, as part of the #NovaScotiaRemembers virtual vigil.

This will be aired on television by CBC, CTV, Eastlink, and Rogers TV; on radio by CBC and local stations; and streamed online by CBC, CTV, and the Facebook group Colchester- Supporting our Communities, from 6:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. EDT and 7:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. ADT.
